t: Amazon
s: Amazon doesn’t want anything illegal sold on their site or anything that would promote an illegal item or activity. You can’t sell a shirt that says “Smoke Weed” because you’re encouraging potential illegal behavior. You may get away with listing an item with a cannabis leaf.

t: Amazon still says no to drugs, and is booting marijuana businesses | The Seattle Times
